ovdesc.p: The purpose of this table is to capture the prerequiste details for creating the portfolio. If a portfolio needs to be created, then the user needs provide the details such as customer information, customer number and account details.

desc.p: This field is used in PW Processes as check field. If the user clicks 'YES', then the system checks the status of the existing activity and executes the next activity. And if user clicks 'NO' then the previous activity is repeated/amended.
This identifies whether an account needs to be created for the portfolio or not. If an account needs to be created, then the user has to click 'YES' or else, 'NO'.
Identifies the customer information availability for the customer. If the customer information is already available, then user needs to click 'Existing' or else, 'New'.
1-10 numeric character Customer ID number or 3-10 type MNE (uppercase alpha or numeric or ".") character Mnemonic Customer id.(Mandatory input.)
